function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conflicts between human and wildlife dimensions in green spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of wildlife-related diseases spreading to humans and vice versa","Mitigation":"Improve surveillance and control measures for diseases in wildlife and educate the public on the risks","Technologies":"Sensor-based disease monitoring systems, public health education campaigns","People":"People who frequent green spaces, wildlife populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, park managers"},{"Description":"Unestablished aspects in the relationship between mental health, wildlife, and green spaces","Impact":"Lack of understanding of potential risks to mental health and wildlife in green spaces","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted research to identify and address potential risks, integrate mental health and wildlife considerations in green space planning","Technologies":"Mental health monitoring tools, ecological impact assessments","People":"Researchers, urban planners, wildlife conservationists","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Conflicts related to the naturalness level of vegetation in green spaces","Impact":"Potential negative outcomes for perceived safety and attractiveness for humans, and wildlife habitat quality","Mitigation":"Implement balanced vegetation management strategies, establish priorities and target beneficiaries for green spaces","Technologies":"Sustainable landscaping practices, habitat enhancement techniques","People":"Park visitors, wildlife populations","Owner":"Park management authorities"}]}
